properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 4:18AM EST until January 5 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE
THROUGH THE WEEKEND... ...LOW WATER CONDITIONS EXPECTED EARLY
SUNDAY MORNING ON TIDAL RIVERS... ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG CONTINUES
THIS MORNING ACROSS THE SOUTHERN WATERS TONIGHT...

.A strong cold front will approach the region tonight and pass
through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to 30 knots
this evening over the coastal waters, becoming west to northwest
and increasing to 30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night
into Sunday morning.

* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and seas 7 to 10 feet expected. For the
Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce visibility to less
than one mile.

* WHERE...S of Cape Lookout to N of Surf City NC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 PM this evening to noon
EST Sunday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 7 AM EST this
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY
